text: The Empirical Software Engineering Journal is a peer-reviewed scientific journal published by the Springer Nature. It was established in 1996 and covers the area of software engineering. The editors-in-chief are Robert Feldt and Thomas Zimmermann. ==Abstracting and indexing== The journal is abstracted and indexed in the Science Citation Index Expanded and Current Contents/Engineering, Computing & Technology. According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2018 impact factor of 4.457. == Past Editors in Chief == * Lionel Briand (University of Ottawa). * Victor Basili (University of Maryland). * Warren Harrison (Portland State University). ==See also== * List of computer science journals * List of engineering journals and magazines * IEEE Transactions on Software Engineering ==References== ==External links== * Category:IEEE academic journals Category:Computer science journals Category:Software engineering publications Category:English-language journals
title: Empirical Software Engineering Journal
